events.name: Save more with Epson Business Inkjet @ Print Pack + Sign 2018
events.description:
Save more with Epson Business Inkjet Printers
Do you know that operating cost associated with printing is the third highest operating cost after rent and payroll? With this in mind, Epson invests significantly in inkjet research and development, and we believe that paying attention to details has the potential to revolutionise industries and help customers achieve business transformation.
PrecisonCore - the breakthrough technology built into our next-generation business inkjet printers help businesses respond more efficiently to the needs of large workgroup, delivering collaboration functions, optimum up-time and industry leading print speeds at lower costs to your business and environment.


Cost Efficiency that's good for the bottom-line and the environment: The unique printhead technology provides cost and substainability advantages of up to 75% lower power consumption than colour lasers in the market and non-emission of dust hazardous to health.




Quality without compromise: PrecisionCore linehead with Nozzle Verification Technology delivers consistently high-quality prints at ultra high speed.




Productivity at breakthrough speed: Printing speed up to 100ipm* in both simplex and duplex print.Â 


Meet the demands of office printing and propel your business into the future with Epson, as we cordially invite you to join us at Print Pack + Sign 2018. 
Hesitate no more and make the switch to Epson Business Inkjet printers at Print Pack + Sign 2018 to receive $120 Capitaland vouchers with every purchase of Epson WF-C869R Replaceable Ink Pack system business inkjet printer!
Visit EpsonÂ @ EIS Business System (Booth CG38) between 18th - 20th July 2018 to receive exclusive Epson-Mercedes AMG Petronas premiums*!
events.location: Marina Bay Sands, Level 1 (Hall B & C) - Booth CG38, 10 Bayfront Avenue, Singapore 018956

events.name: Startup Stories: Deep Tech Built from Singapore for the World
events.description: Please register here, https://www.sginnovate.com/events/startup-stories-deep-tech-built-singapore-world Startup Stories: Deep Tech Built from Singapore for the World Presented by SGInnovate Forget metrics like Gross Merchandise Value, Conversions and Traffic Growth. The founders and senior executives of Deep Technology companies in Singapore, covering the fields of space tech, medtech, autonomous vehicles, show how their companies offer a direct benefit to the environment, healthcare and urban planning. events.name: Evening Workshop on Gaskets Technology
events.description:
Jointly organised by The ASME Singapore Section, Pressure Systems Interest Group (PSIG), and Setsco Services Pte Ltd, the workshop aims to introduce attendees to the latest gasket technology with practical demonstrations on the importance of joint integrity and controlled bolting techniques.
Speaker: Paul Welsford
Date: 18 July 2018, Wednesday
Time: 6.00pm - 9.00pm
Venue: Newton Room @ Setsco Services Pte Ltd (18, Teban Gardens Crescent, Singapore 608925)
Fee: Complimentary (refreshments will be served)
CPD: 2 PDUs awarded by the Professional Engineers Board, Singapore (for Singapore-registered PEs)
About the Speaker:
Paul Welsford has worked for Flexitallic Ltd for over 10 years, covering disciplines from production engineering, production management, business development in Kazakhstan and applications engineering. Paul is now based in Singapore as the Regional Sales Manager for Japan and Australasia. He provides support to the local industries with regards to sealing solutions and shares best practice knowledge on joint integrity. With a BEng degree from Loughborough University in Product Design and Manufacture and being an associate member of the IMechE he has supported new product introduction within Flexitallic leading to overall cost savings and improved safety for plants in a variety of industries.
Â 
FAQs
Â 
How can I contact the organiser with any questions?
You may contact any of the following.

ASME Singapore Section - ericho@asme.org

events.group_name: American Society of Mechanical Engineers, Singapore Section

events.name: Serverless Data & Scaling Machine Learning on Google Cloud by Go-Jek & Traveloka
events.description: Hi everyone! We have an exciting set of speakers from Go-Jek & Traveloka for the month of July 2018 and would love for you to join us! Agenda:1) Scaling Machine Learning on Google Cloud by Willem Pienaar, Data Science Platform Lead at Go-Jek 2) Serverless Data Analytics with Google Cloud by Wilson Lauw, Lead Data Engineer at Traveloka and Gaurav Anand, Solutions Engineer at Google Cloud Hope to see you all there!
events.location: Google Asia Pacific, 70, Pasir Panjang Road, #03-71, Mapletree Business City, Singapore 117371
events.group_name: Google Cloud Platform User Group Singapore

events.name: Git Workshop
events.description: Git is THE version control system for open source. Come join us for an evening of fun with Git!Rampreet Sandhu will be leading us on exploring the intricacies of Git. She will go through the following:-1. VCS vs DVCS2. Key concepts in Git - file status etc3. BitBucket overview4. Demo of most commonly used Git commands Schedule:6.30 - 7.00 PM: Check-in & Networking7.00 - 7.10 PM: Updates from Women Who Code & Host Introduction7.10 - 8.30 PM: Git Workshop â€¢ What to bringPlease bring your laptops with some pre-requisites installed:- Git This event is open to everyone who is there to inspire women to excel in tech careers. All members are required to abide by the Women Who Code Code of Conduct - https://www.womenwhocode.com/blog/code-of-conduct Please let us know your name and email address to be included in our mailing list. https://goo.gl/forms/P3ybXQQAhkygKQYo2
